member.name: IAMResourceControl.Reserve

Microsoft suggests that existing code that uses the legacy APIs be rewritten to use the new APIs if possible.]
The Reserve method reserves or unreserves a device resource.

member.param: Flag indicating whether to reserve or unreserve this device. The value must be a member of the enumeration.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if the device was successfully reserved or unreserved, S_FALSE if the device is currently reserved and will continue to be held, or an HRESULT error code if the device can't be reserved.
